body.para: On Wed, Nov 17, 2010 at 9:21 AM, Jean-Louis MONTEIRO <jean-louis.monteiro@atosorigin.com> wrote:

quote.quotepara: Hum, gave it a try and all seems to pass. I won't pull my hair out ;-)

body.para: No worries, the help is appreciated.
I found a solution for getting JDK 1.5 back on my mac:

Was able to verify we have this issue in 3.1.3 as well, so let's kick this release out and fix it in a 3.1.5. We might take the opportunity to also do that simple JUnit runner as well. Stephen Connolly has a bunch of great pom changes in there as well.
Will wrap this one up shortly.
